Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-32256 affecting package gcc for versions less than 11.2.0-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-32256 affecting package gcc for versions less than 11.2.0-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package gcc is earlier than 11.2.0-9, affected by CVE-2021-32256
